[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@apollo/client-react-streaming](./client-react-streaming.md) &gt; [QueryEvent](./client-react-streaming.queryevent.md)

## QueryEvent type

Events that will be emitted by a wrapped ApolloClient instance during SSR on `DataTransportProviderImplementation.registerDispatchRequestStarted`<!-- -->, to be transported to the browser and replayed there using `DataTransportProviderImplementation.onQueryEvent`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type QueryEvent = {
    type: "started";
    options: TransportedOptions;
    id: TransportIdentifier;
} | {
    type: "data";
    id: TransportIdentifier;
    result: FetchResult;
} | {
    type: "error";
    id: TransportIdentifier;
} | {
    type: "complete";
    id: TransportIdentifier;
};
```
